Text: how can you change the servers????
sorry ... how can i change the server to a private server?:)
i can't find the fu**ing realmist:(

ATTENTION!!!
To find realmlist
go to
your game folder>euGB or enGB and realmlist should be there
How to change to private server go to your realmlist and change to the realm name you want for the server

To play on a private server you first need to find a website to one. Then there's detailed instructions on how to play on the private server.
Hope this helps!
